title.text: The Beginning (Chapter: Spirited Away by the Demon, Part 1)
鬼隠し編 其ノ壱 ハジマリ

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Keiichi Maebara, a student who recently moved into the village of Hinamizawa, is invited by his new friends at school to join their club. But while searching for treasure at a garbage dump, he discovers the village is not as peaceful as it seems.

title.text: The Secret (Chapter: Spirited Away by the Demon, Part 2)
鬼隠し編 其ノ弐 隠しごと

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: The Cotton Drifting Festival is coming up and everyone goes to have a day of fun. During the festival, Keiichi gets separated from everyone and he meets Tomitake the photographer again, who later tells him more about the shocking past of Hinamizawa.

title.text: Suspicion (Chapter: Spirited Away by the Demon, Part 3)
鬼隠し編 其ノ参 疑心

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Delving further into the mysteries surrounding the village, Keiichi's paranoia grows after he starts to suspect that someone might be after his life.

title.text: Disturbance (Chapter: Spirited Away by the Demon, Part 4)
鬼隠し編 其ノ四 歪

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Unnerved by Rena and Mion's menacing behavior, Keiichi begins to distance himself from his former friends — but it might already be too late.

title.text: 綿流し編 其ノ壱 嫉妬

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Keiichi meets his friends in town to win prizes at a card game. Afterwards, at a restaurant, he is surprised to see Mion as a waitress, and even more surprised to find out it's not actually Mion.

title.text: 綿流し編 其ノ弐 タカノ

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: The day for the Cotton Drifting Festival has arrived, and during Rika's ritual performance, Keiichi is taken to see the sacred festival storehouse.

title.text: 綿流し編 其ノ参 嘘

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Keiichi indirectly confesses to Rika about sneaking into the forbidden shrine, and he fears his admission may have put Rika and Satako's lives in danger.

title.text: 綿流し編 其ノ四 願い

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: The truth behind the recent incidents and the dark origins of Hinamizawa finally start to unravel as Keiichi and Rena decide to confront their suspect.

title.text: 祟殺し編 其の壱 兄

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: When Keiichi's parents leave for Tokyo for a few days, Satoko and Rika offer to help him around the house and he learns about the mysterious disappearance of Satoko's older brother, Satoshi.

title.text: 祟殺し編 其の弐 キズナ

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Satoko has been absent from school, and Keiichi starts to worry about her family situation after discovering the cause of her absence.

title.text: 祟殺し編 其の参 境界

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Following Satoko’s disturbing panic attack in the classroom, Keiichi’s concern for her well-being grows to the point where he plans to take matters into his own hands.

title.text: 祟殺し編 其の四 失しモノ

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: After strange encounters with Takano, Dr. Irie, and Inspector Oishi, Keiichi starts to question whether the previous night's incident actually occurred.

title.text: 祟殺し編 其の伍 謝罪

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: When Keiichi heads to Satoko's house and finds her in need of medical attention, he becomes convinced that Oyashiro-sama's curse may be the cause of all these recent misfortunes.

title.text: 暇潰し編 其の壱 ヒナミザワ

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Four years ago, during the Hinamizawa dam incident, young police investigator Mamoru Akasaka comes to the village to investigate a child kidnapping, where he meets young Rika.

title.text: 暇潰し編 其の弐 兆し

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Mamoru and Oishi discover some important clues, and head to the district of Takatsudo to continue the search for the Cabinet Minister's son. Little do they know, there are much more sinister forces at work.

title.text: 目明し編 其の壱 初恋

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: The events from The Cotton Drifting Chapter are retold from another point of view. After two years away from the village, Shion comes back to Hinamizawa.

title.text: 目明し編 其の弐 ケジメ

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: The recent incident at school has left Shion feeling very uneasy. She is able to muster the courage to call Satoshi, only to receive an apology from him. Something doesn't seem right.

title.text: Meakashi-hen Sono San – Oni no Ketsumyaku
Oni's Blood Line (Chapter: Eye Opening, Part 3)
目明し編 其の参 鬼の血脈

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: When Shion decides to investigate Satoshi's disappearance, she meets Takano at the library, who tells her more about the dark history of Hinamizawa. The very next year, the past begins to repeat itself.

title.text: 目明し編 其の四 仕返し

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Shion overhears a conversation between Mion and her grandmother and begins to suspect her family may be involved in the recent events.

title.text: 目明し編 其の伍 冷たい手

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: After questioning Headmaster Kimiyoshi for information about the previous murders and Satoshi's disappearance, Shion sets her sights on another one of the Three Great Families.

title.text: 目明し編 其の六 断罪

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Shion tricks Keiichi into thinking that he may have put his friends in danger. However, when he figures out the truth, Shion is confronted by Keiichi and Rena.

title.text: 罪滅し編 其の壱 幸せ

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: After a day of summer fun, Rena goes to the garbage dump, where she begins to remember things from her troubling family background.

title.text: 罪滅し編 其の弐 還る処

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Rena learns of Rina's plot, and a confrontation at the deserted garbage dump triggers another disastrous chain of events.

title.text: 罪滅し編 其の参 34号文書

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: While studying Takano's scrapbooks, Rena starts to uncover the the truth behind Oyashiro-sama's curse and Hinamizawa's dark past.

title.text: 罪滅し編 其の四 地球侵略

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: By discovering the truth behind Oyashiro-sama's curse, Rena has become a target of one of the Three Great Families, and she decides to go into hiding.

title.text: 罪滅し編 其の伍 リテイク

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Rena has returned, but not for the right reasons, as she causes a serious crisis at the school, and demands the police investigate the Three Great Families' connection to Oyashiro-sama's curse. What will become of Keiichi and his friends?

overviews.content:
Keiichi Maebara has just moved to the quiet little village of Hinamizawa in the summer of 1983, and quickly becomes inseparable friends with schoolmates Rena Ryuuguu, Mion Sonozaki, Satoko Houjou, and Rika Furude. However, darkness lurks underneath the seemingly idyllic life they lead. 
As the village prepares for its annual festival, Keiichi learns about the local legends surrounding it. To his horror, he discovers that there have been several murders and disappearances in the village in the recent years, and that they all seem to be connected to the festival and the village's patron god, Oyashiro. Keiichi tries to ask his new friends about these incidents, but they are suspiciously silent and refuse to give him the answers he needs. As more and more bizarre events occur, he wonders just what else his friends might be keeping from him, and if he can even trust them at all.
When madness and paranoia begin taking root in Keiichi's heart, he will stumble straight into the mysteries at work in Higurashi no Naku Koro ni, a story that is told across multiple arcs.
[Written by MAL Rewrite]

rawEntry.synopsis:
Keiichi Maebara has just moved to the quiet little village of Hinamizawa in the summer of 1983, and quickly becomes inseparable friends with schoolmates Rena Ryuuguu, Mion Sonozaki, Satoko Houjou, and Rika Furude. However, darkness lurks underneath the seemingly idyllic life they lead. 
As the village prepares for its annual festival, Keiichi learns about the local legends surrounding it. To his horror, he discovers that there have been several murders and disappearances in the village in the recent years, and that they all seem to be connected to the festival and the village's patron god, Oyashiro. Keiichi tries to ask his new friends about these incidents, but they are suspiciously silent and refuse to give him the answers he needs. As more and more bizarre events occur, he wonders just what else his friends might be keeping from him, and if he can even trust them at all.
When madness and paranoia begin taking root in Keiichi's heart, he will stumble straight into the mysteries at work in Higurashi no Naku Koro ni, a story that is told across multiple arcs.
[Written by MAL Rewrite]

titles.ja_jp: ひぐらしのなく頃に
